content: @Mayhem I thought the TV was on sale? The commercial aired about half an hour ago! #MayhemSale

I kept hearin these weird horn noises and i got scared and thought that some clown was gonna attack me

then i realized that the tv was on
The tv was on bet when the ball dropped. They played no flex zone song and I thought of @HalleKRichards singing it
I WAS ON MY PHONE AND THE TV WAS ON AND MY MUM SAID: "ISN'T THAT JENNIFER LAWRENCE" AND I NEARLY DIED BC THEY WERE PLAYING SLP
it's 2014 in my eyes still bc the tv was on  the wrong channel when the ball dropped and we missed it and i refuse to accept that it's 2015
The TV was on mute and I did about 5 full minutes of hilarious improve voice-over for the commercials. I was... http://fb.me/3KziqG1vf

여러분 새해 복 많이 받아요 ^^
So, my bestie and I were up last night at the TV was on, and guess what came on?? It was this ... pic.twitter.com/VugYTIHcsb
Given that she's autistic and the tv was on, this photo is a miracle. #littlesister pic.twitter.com/C1I6oX25bO
I was so fucked up last night I fell asleep eating and woke up thinking I was deaf cuz the tv was on mute B

@TahhDah @onodorable i saw this shit bout an hour ago when i walked to the kitchen to make ramen and the tv was on
i was confused.
Went into the living room and the tv was on and my cats just sitting there watching it. I'm home alone..
“@ta_cocaine: I told LaLa the tv was on fire, girl was bout to take flight down them stairs.”LMFAO
“@ta_cocaine: I told LaLa the tv was on fire, girl was bout to take flight down them stairs.”
I told LaLa the tv was on fire, girl was bout to take flight down them stairs.
I was watching videos on my phone while the tv was on and Victoria comes and turns off the tv so now my only light is my phone ;~;
My aunt and uncle came over earlier and the tv was on and there was so much going on and I had a bad anxiety attack and almost passed out>.<
The TV was on and I was half paying attention to the narrator. I look up and it's Katie Holmes smiling and I audibly gasped and recoiled
So ESPN was replaying some games of the World Cup last night and you best believe I didn't give 2 fucks about presents when the tv was on.

Mom: HAVE YOU EVER WATCHED THAT SHOW "BLACKISH"?!? IT'S SO FUNNY!!
Me: Why are you screaming? I am right here.
Mom: I thought the TV was on.
Thought the TV was on live pause
As soon as my grandpa got to our house he made sure the tv was on John Wayne
the TV caught on fire. i ran up to tell everyone that the TV was on fire and they thought I was joking and told me to go away
WQHO FUCKNG TRUNED THE TV IM ALONE DOWNSTAIRS AND THE TV WAS ON AND WHEN I BLINK THE SCREEN IS ALL BLACK ARE U KIDDING ME
I woke up and the TV was on the Disney Christmas Frozen celebration. Please. Please send help.
I was watching the #30for30Marathon, left the room, came back, and the TV was on the #ChrisleyKnowsBest marathon.
We lasted a whole 200 minutes before the tv was on with some crappy football show. #MerryChristmas
SO MY PARENTS ARE AT A CHRISTMAS THING AND SO I WENT DOWNSTAIRS AND THE TV WAS ON AND SO WERE ALL THE LIGHTS
@chanyeuor SAME but the tv was on all the time lmao
One time I was soo high, that I was watching tv for a hour and I didnt even kno the Tv was on mute
